properties.scriptContent:
param([string] $userAzureLoginId = $userAzureLoginId, [string] $keyVaultName = $keyVaultName)
Install-Module -Name "Az.Accounts" -Force
$PWord = ConvertTo-SecureString -String $userAzureLoginPassword -AsPlainText -Force
$User = $userAzureLoginId
$Credential = New-Object -TypeName System.Management.Automation.PSCredential -ArgumentList $User, $PWord
Connect-AzAccount -Credential $Credential
Import-Module Az.Resources
$timestamp=Get-Date -Format 'MM-dd-yyyy-HH-mm-ss'
$ServicePrincipalName = 'purview-synapse-poc-'+$timestamp
$ServicePrincipal = New-AzAdServicePrincipal -DisplayName $ServicePrincipalName
$obj = (Get-AzADApplication -DisplayName $ServicePrincipalName).ObjectId
$appClientSecret = New-Guid
$date = Get-Date
$appClientSecretSecureString = ConvertTo-SecureString $appClientSecret -AsPlainText -Force
$newCredential = New-AzADAppCredential -ObjectId $obj -Password $appClientSecretSecureString -StartDate $date -EndDate $date.AddYears(1)
$tenantID = (Get-AzSubscription -SubscriptionName $subscriptionName).TenantId
$appClientID = $ServicePrincipal.ApplicationId
$userObjectId=(Get-AzADUser -UserPrincipalName $azureUserId).Id
$DeploymentScriptOutputs = @{}
$DeploymentScriptOutputs['tenantID'] = $tenantID
$DeploymentScriptOutputs['appClientID'] = $appClientID
$DeploymentScriptOutputs['appClientSecret'] = $appClientSecret
$DeploymentScriptOutputs['userObjectId'] = $userObjectId
